data.actual_result: The timer goes all the way to the end and gets stuck there which causes the notification to not close at all.
data.short_description: Clicking on any of the links in the connection problems in app notification and then going back takes the timer to the end and the notification never slides away.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get the connection problems in app notification. - Click on any of the links (server status or @discordapp). - Close the custom Chrome tab (or go back to the app if you're not using the custom Chrome tab). - Observe the timer on the notification.
